titles.title: To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to ban the use of credit information for most employment decisions, and for other purposes.
Restricting Credit Checks for Employment Decisions Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Restricting Credit Checks for Employment Decisions Act
This bill generally prohibits a consumer reporting agency from providing a consumer's credit information for employment purposes, unless otherwise required by law or regulation or for a national security investigation.
